channel.title: Bamboo Payment – Countries and payment methods
channel.description: Recent content in Countries and payment methods on Bamboo Payment

item.title: Docs: Argentina
item.description:
This section shows the available payment methods, currencies, and related information you must consider when processing in Argentina.

Payment methods

Payment MediaId Payment Method Purchase Pre-authorization Full refund Partial Refund Type Flow
1 VISA Credit Card API
2 MasterCard Credit Card API
3 American Express Credit Card API
6 Visa Débito Debit Card API
7 Visa Prepago Prepaid Credit Card API
11 PassCard Credit Card API
13 MasterCard Débito Debit Card API
14 MasterCard Prepago Prepaid Credit Card API
17 Cabal Credit Card API
61 Pago Fácil Cash API
72 Transferencias 3.0 Wallet API
532 Offline Bank Transfer Bank Transfer Redirect

Currencies

Code Description Mode
USD US Dollar CrossBorder
ARS Argentine Peso Domestic and CrossBorder

Amount limits

Cards Cash Transfers and Wallets
Minimum ARS 1 ARS 1 ARS 1
Maximum ARS 99.999.999.999.999.999 ARS 1.000.000,00 ARS 3.345.000,00
USD 12.500,00

Document types

The following table describes the valid document types for Argentina:

Code Document name Abbreviation
4 Documento Nacional de Identidad DNI
5 Código único de Identificación Laboral CUIL

Argentina provinces

When creating the Purchase in Argentina, and you want to include the province in the field customer.state, configure any of the following values:

Province Code for customer.state
Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires C
Buenos Aires B
Catamarca K
Chaco H
Chubut U
Córdoba X
Corrientes W
Entre Ríos E
Formosa P
Jujuy Y
La Pampa L
La Rioja F
Mendoza M
Misiones N
Neuquén Q
Río Negro R
Salta A
San Juan J
San Luis D
Santa Cruz Z
Santa Fe S
Santiago del Estero G
Tierra del Fuego V
Tucumán T

item.title: Docs: Central America
item.description:
This section shows the available payment methods, currencies, and related information to consider when processing in Costa Rica, El Salvador, and Nicaragua.

Payment methods

Payment MediaId Payment Method Purchase Pre-authorization Full refund Partial Refund Type Flow
28 PuntoXpress Cash API

Currencies

Code Description Mode
USD US Dollar Domestic* and CrossBorder
CRC Costa Rican colón Domestic and CrossBorder
NIO Nicaraguan córdoba Domestic and CrossBorder

*USD for domestic purchases is only available for El Salvador.

Document types

The following table describes the valid document types for Central America.

Code Document name Abbreviation Country
30 Cédula de identidad CI Costa Rica
31 Documento de Identidad Migratoria para Extranjeros DIMEX Costa Rica
32 Pasaporte PA Costa Rica
33 Cédula de identidad CI Nicaragua
34 Pasaporte PA Nicaragua
35 Registro Único de Contribuyente RUC Nicaragua
42 Documento único de identidad DUI El Salvador
43 Pasaporte PA El Salvador
44 Número de identificación tributaria NIT El Salvador
45 Número de Registro de Contribuyente NRC El Salvador

item.title: Docs: Mexico
item.description:
This section shows the available payment methods, currencies, and related information to consider when processing in Mexico.

Payment methods

Payment MediaId Payment Method Purchase Pre-authorization Full refund Partial Refund Type Flow
1 VISA Credit & Debit Card API
2 MasterCard Credit & Debit Card API
3 American Express Credit Card API
30 Paynet Cash API
35 Oxxo Cash API
73 SPEI Bank Transfer API
111 Visa Credit & Debit Card Redirect
111 Mastercard Credit & Debit Card Redirect
111 American Express Credit Card Redirect
111 Carnet Credit Card Redirect
113 Carnet Crédito Credit Card API
114 Carnet Débito Debit Card API

Currencies

Code Description Mode
USD US Dollar CrossBorder
MXN Mexican Peso Domestic and CrossBorder

Amount limits

Cards Cash Bank transfer
Minimum MXN 1 MXN 1 MXN 0,01
Maximum MXN 10.000 MXN 29.999,99 -

Note

The maximum amount for Cash payment depends on the cash payment office.

  • For 7Eleven, and Farmacias del Ahorro is MXN 5.000,00.
  • For Farmacias Benavides, Walmart Express, Circle K, and OXXO is MXN 10.000,00.

item.title: Docs: Paraguay
item.description:
Note

We only offer support for merchants in Paraguay through the Gateway model, and we send the invoice to them from Uruguay.

This section shows the available payment methods, currencies, and related information to consider when processing in Paraguay.

Payment methods

Payment MediaId Payment Method Purchase Pre-authorization Full refund Partial Refund Type Flow
1 Visa Credit card API
2 Mastercard Credit & Debit card API
3 American Express Credit & Debit card API
6 Visa Débito Debit card API
21 Bancard Check Credit card API
22 Credifielco Credit card API
23 Infonet Debit card API
27 Pago Express Cash API

Currencies

Code Description
USD US Dollar
PYG Paraguayan Guaraní

Document types

The following table describes the valid document types for Paraguay:

Code Document name Abbreviation
1 Registro Único del Contribuyente RUC
2 Cédula de Identidad CIC
3 Documento Extranjero DEX
23 Referencia genérica GEN

item.title: Docs: Peru
item.description:
This section shows the available payment methods, currencies, and related information to consider when processing in Peru.

Payment methods

Payment MediaId Payment Method Purchase Pre-authorization Full refund Partial Refund Type Flow
1 VISA Credit Card API
2 MasterCard Credit Card API
6 Visa Débito Debit card API
7 Visa Prepago Prepaid Credit Card API
13 MasterCard Débito Debit Card API
14 MasterCard Prepago Prepaid Credit Card API
26 PagoEfectivo Perú Cash API
46 BCP Cash API
47 Caja Arequipa Cash API
48 Caja Cusco Cash API
49 Caja Huancayo Cash API
50 Caja Ica Cash API
51 Caja Piura Cash API
52 Caja Tacna Cash API
53 Caja Trujillo Cash API
54 Interbank Cash API
55 Western Union Cash API
103 BBVA Cash API

Considerations

  • For Visa and MasterCard, the acquirer performs a void operation if you request a refund on the same day before 0:00. You can only process refunds for transactions that occurred more than 48 hours after the settlement.
  • You can perform zero authorization transactions to register or validate cards for Visa and MasterCard.

Currencies

Code Description Mode
USD US Dollar Domestic and CrossBorder
PEN Peruvian Sol Domestic and CrossBorder

Amount limits

Cards Cash
Minimum PEN 1 PEN 1
Maximum - PEN 5.000

Document types

The following table describes the valid document types for Peru:

Code Document name Abbreviation
6 Documento Nacional de Identidad DNI
7 Partida PAR
8 Pasaporte PAS
9 Libreta militar LMI
10 Otro NAN
